title: New Year, New Ways Forward
description:
Jillian and Cindy dish on realistic New Year strategies to chart a powerful course of action that cuts through the nonsense and get things done in 2022. Learn to rip envy and jealousy out at the root while channeling that energy into more productive ventures. Adopt practical life strategies to mitigate chaos by reducing exposure to triggers. And, get the run down on all the cool health and fitness gadgets and products trending for 2022.


For 25% off The Fitness App by Jillian Michaels, go to www.thefitnessapp.com/podcastdeal

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy

Jillian Michaels Community: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1880466198675549

Email your questions to JillianPodcast@gmail.com


You can find new episodes of Keeping It Real: Conversations with Jillian Michaels, completely ad free, on Wondery+ https://wondery.app.link/jillian

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
